title: 13.10.2015 Increased tax on cigarettes will prevent children from becoming lured into a killer addiction ...
text: ( Source : Department of Children and Youth Affairs of Ireland ) Tuesday 13th October , 2015 Minister Reilly warmly welcomed the announcement that the price of a packet of 20 cigarettes will increase by 50 cent and a pro rata increase on all
